title: coblee
author: coblee
content: See here for the original announcement of these collectibles: https://twitter.com/SatoshiLite/status/1693108563630342170GreatCollections has a page dedicated to these cards:https://greatcollections.com/litecoinThe first 21 are slabbed in a PCGS large format holder with a label signed by me. These will go on auction 5 per week. #1 through #5 will end on October 29.https://www.greatcollections.com/Coin/1464626/2023-625-LTC-Ballet-Litecoin-50g-Silver-Block-PCGS-Certified-Genuine-Hand-Signed-by-Creator-Charlie-Lee-1-of-21https://www.greatcollections.com/Coin/1464627/2023-625-LTC-Ballet-Litecoin-50g-Silver-Block-PCGS-Certified-Genuine-Hand-Signed-by-Creator-Charlie-Lee-2-of-21https://www.greatcollections.com/Coin/1464628/2023-625-LTC-Ballet-Litecoin-50g-Silver-Block-PCGS-Certified-Genuine-Hand-Signed-by-Creator-Charlie-Lee-3-of-21https://www.greatcollections.com/Coin/1464629/2023-625-LTC-Ballet-Litecoin-50g-Silver-Block-PCGS-Certified-Genuine-Hand-Signed-by-Creator-Charlie-Lee-4-of-21https://www.greatcollections.com/Coin/1464630/2023-625-LTC-Ballet-Litecoin-50g-Silver-Block-PCGS-Certified-Genuine-Hand-Signed-by-Creator-Charlie-Lee-5-of-21I've also put up one of my 2020 12.5 LTC cards in the auction.https://www.greatcollections.com/Coin/1464631/2020-125-LTC-Ballet-Litecoin-50g-Silver-Full-Block-Loaded-PCGS-Certified-Genuine-Serial-AA063298The standard cards are sold for $840 each and will be added to GreatCollections about 50 cards at a time. You can find all the cards currently available for sale here:https://www.greatcollections.com/search.php?q=ltc&mode=product&sort=01All proceeds go to the Litecoin Foundation to promote the adoption, education, and development of Litecoin!

comments.author: coblee
comments.body: Here's what the standard card looks like.

comments.author: thiago007
comments.body: Personal opinion, It is a little disappointing for me personally that you have not posted several here in the forum when it is easier for us in addition to the support that many of us have given it. Either way I wish you luck with the sale.

comments.author: coblee
comments.body: Quote from: thiago007 on October 21, 2023, 03:27:04 AMPersonal opinion, It is a little disappointing for me personally that you have not posted several here in the forum when it is easier for us in addition to the support that many of us have given it. Either way I wish you luck with the sale.I don't understand what you are saying."you have not posted several here in the forum"that I have not posted what in the forum?"when it is easier for us "what's easier for you?"in addition to the support that many of us have given it"support that many have given Litecoin?

comments.author: thiago007
comments.body: Maybe I was a bit short on words, but what I wanted to say is that you didn't put it up for sale here on the forum like the previous of 12.5. Litecoin Cards

comments.author: coblee
comments.body: Quote from: thiago007 on October 21, 2023, 03:37:02 AMMaybe I was a bit short on words, but what I wanted to say is that you didn't put it up for sale here on the forum like the previous of 12.5. Litecoin CardsI thought having a site (greatcollections.com) handle the sale is easier for both of us. They also accept BTC and LTC. Let me know how it's easier with paying LF directly. I can make that happen if that's the case.

comments.author: coblee
comments.body: One day left! After the auction ends, auction foer #6-#10 will be listed.

comments.author: coblee
comments.body: #11-#15 are listed with pics. These will end on Sunday. And of course, you can still buy a regular edition one for $840.

comments.author: coblee
comments.body: The last 5 signed cards are listed. https://www.greatcollections.com/search.php?q=ltc&mode=product&sort=01

comments.author: kryme
comments.body: If anyone here got #11, I'd be interested as I have number #11 of the 12.5 block.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: kryme on December 17, 2023, 04:57:36 PMIf anyone here got #11, I'd be interested as I have number #11 of the 12.5 block.I got #76
